alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 5:24PM EDT until May 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in central Ohio... Hocking County in central Ohio... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hocking Hills State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Logan, Nelsonville, Bremen, Pleasantville, Hocking Hills State Park, Hide-A-Way Hills, Starr, Amanda, Murray City, Sugar Grove, Rushville, West Rushville, Fairfield County Airport, Ilesboro, Haydenville, North Berne, Union Furnace and Oreville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Ohio.
